bug.author: theorician
bug.summary: Commas in folder names cause autogenerated "folder albums" to come up empty.
bug.description: To reproduce: When importing a folder with a comma in the name, the photos are imported fine. However, the auto-generated album that shows up Sidebar > Albums > Folders shows no photos. This is running the latest photoprism docker container.
